name: js-catalog
description: 无依赖生成文档目录(Generate a directory based on the HTML structure without dependencies)

scripts.build: rm -rf lib && babel --presets es2015 src -d lib --copy-files && mkdir lib/dist && uglifyjs lib/index.js -m -o lib/dist/js-catalog.min.js && uglifycss lib/style/style.css > lib/style/style.min.css

author: scyuan
